tools.title: Cosine Decomposition
tools.summary: A visualizer for decomposing a phase-shifted cosine into its constituent sine and cosine waves.

tools.title: Change of Basis
tools.summary: A change of basis visualizer for linear transformations.

tools.title: Game Solver
tools.summary: Do you want to remove sudoku from your life? Look no further.

tools.title: Synesthesia
tools.summary: Synesthesia displays a visual representation of the guitar fretboard and allows users to highlight all notes that they want to include while soloing in a guitar-hero-esk style. Great for beginners who don't yet have scales memorized.

tools.title: RGB Axis
tools.summary: RGB Axis allows users to explore the RGB color space in an interactive way.
